scripts.copyfiles: mkdir -p dist && cp node_modules/todomvc-app-css/index.css public/todomvc-app-css.css && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.css public/todomvc-common.css && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.js public/todomvc-common.js
scripts.build: npm run copyfiles && dotnet fable src --run rollup -c
scripts.dev: npm run copyfiles && dotnet fable watch src --run rollup -cw
scripts.start: http-server public & npm run dev & open http://localhost:8080
